Desc.entry: A non-profit making social enterprise that works to protect and improve the waterside environment in Sheffield for both people and wildlife. Aims to deliver a high quality waterway management service to business and support communities to help improve the quality of Sheffield's waterways. Provides help to businesses with riverside land management and works with local community and environmental groups who require support with river clean ups etc. Works in partnership with Groundwork Sheffield (see separate entry), Sheffield City Council, Sheffield Wildlife Trust (see separate entry), The Environment Agency, Five Weirs Walk Trust (see separate entry) and Upper Don Walk Trust (see separate entry).
